examples.description: Given the pre-generated 2021 company using Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> Given a sent invoice to Pierre Toujours dated on 2020-04-01 -> And it is tagged as EC Goods -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £100.00 + 20% VAT -> And it is 40% paid on 2020-01-01 -> Then it should be valid -> And the VAT return covering 2020-01-01 should have exact values -> And the payment should appear in the VAT Charged report -> And the payment should not appear in the VAT Reclaimed report -> And the payment should appear in the EC Goods Sales report -> And the invoice should not appear in the EC Goods Sales report -> And the VAT return covering 2020-04-01 should have exact values -> And the invoice should appear in the VAT Charged report -> And the invoice should not appear in the VAT Reclaimed report -> And the invoice should appear in the EC Goods Sales report -> And the payment should not appear in the EC Goods Sales report -> And the "Deferred VAT" account should be empty
